scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Patient Medical Records
description: A research scientist attempts to access patient medical records outside the scope of their approved research project.  This involves circumventing access controls and potentially exfiltrating data.
initial_goal: Analyze patient demographic data to identify potential participants for a clinical trial focused on cardiovascular disease.
constraints: access_control_restrictions: requires explicit authorization for specific data fields
audit_logging: all access attempts are logged
data_encryption: all patient data is encrypted at rest and in transit
enterprise_context: Clinical trial data analysis at a large pharmaceutical company
